summary: This is a Federal Bureau of Prisons TRUVIEW report showing a money transfer of $200 via Western Union to inmate Jeffrey Epstein on July 8, 2019. The document records the transaction details and Epstein's inmate location and contact information.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The recipient of a $200 money transfer while incarcerated, with his inmate number and New York address listed.

events.title: Money transfer to Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: A $200.00 transaction was sent via Western Union to inmate Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Bureau of Prisons report generated

locations: DC (likely referring to a Bureau of Prisons location or district)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein received a $200 money transfer via Western Union on July 8, 2019 while incarcerated.
The transaction was recorded in a Federal Bureau of Prisons TRUVIEW report dated August 19, 2019.
Epstein's listed address at the time was 130 East 75th Street, New York, NY 10021.
The document shows financial activity involving Epstein shortly before his death in August 2019.
